DOC.brief_summary: Our hypothesis addition ShearWave Elastography ( SWE ) conventional breast ultrasound examination provide useful information radiologist image lesion breast , compare conventional grayscale ultrasound alone .
DOC.criteria: patient refer breast ultrasound positive physical palpation and/or positive mammogram and/or positive ultrasound and/or positive MRI . female age 21 old provide inform consent Women unwilling unable provide inform consent Women breast implant Women superficial lesion lesion skin ( superficial surface lesion within 5 mm skin surface ) Women pregnant breastfeed Women undergo chemotherapy radiotherapy cancer Women previous breast conserving surgery breast interest Note : Previous excision benign lesion 4 cm away suspect lesion constitute exclusion criterion .
